Articles.Content:
Though most of the terrain seams on the runway were fixed in 1.3, I found one next to the SPH. It's visible when facing west on the runway.

Pics: https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B0eMT8zRijNmUGtWNWZQSzBGM2c

edit: just realized I'm probably reporting this wrong.

Edited May 28, 2017 by 53miner53
Yes, can confirm that seam to be still visible in KSP 1.3 under some circumstances (e.g. I see it only when the camera is facing east or down, not west). Very small and not bumpy for what I can see:

There may still be small visual gaps which are unavoidable (think of it as grass growing between the paved sections), but there should not be bumps. If bumps are still present, then please report this on the tracker. The facility levels will need to be identified preferably with a savegame attached.

On 5/30/2017 at 7:48 AM, Squelch said:

There may still be small visual gaps which are unavoidable (think of it as grass growing between the paved sections), but there should not be bumps. If bumps are still present, then please report this on the tracker. The facility levels will need to be identified preferably with a savegame attached.

I investigated further in a clean save file here, and I found 3, marked by flags.
